H0.text: In which town did the Co-operative Movement begin. Manchester

H1.text: In which town did the Co-operative Movement begin. Leeds

H2.text: In which town did the Co-operative Movement begin. Birmingham

H3.text: In which town did the Co-operative Movement begin. ROCHDALE

A4.text: The Rochdale Pioneers opened the first Co-operative shop in Toad Lane in 1844.
